text:
-4-
Other information is contained in my report which was submitted to the
members of the Committee soon after tho close of the Conference. Prior to its
publication in "Education by Radio", copies of this report wore submitted to
all official delegations which participated in the Conference, and to other
interested groups and persons, with the request that any inaccuracies be pointed
out. Judge Sykes, chairman of the American delegation, has declined to make any
criticism. I recommend that any criticisms made be circulated with the report.
